alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 8:37PM EDT until August 15 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Western Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 737 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near De Funiak Springs, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Vernon, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ebro, Whitehead Crossroads, Villa Tasso, Gulf Resort Beach, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Bahama Beach, Rock Hill, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Pleasant Ridge, Knox Hill and Four Mile Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
